name: Bi-Directional
description:
Bi-Directional is an endless shooter that shows you two views of the game - one from the left and one from the right.

It's an entry for the BYOG 2021 Game Jam on the theme Two Views.

Instructions on how to play the game are in the game itself.

Made in collaboration with -

brukey and tejaschichkar

The entry was deleted by mistake from the game page and itch didn't allow to upload it again.
